title: FS: T206 Cobb (Bat Off). Fantastic Eye Appeal.
author: christopher.herman

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb (Bat Off). Fantastic Eye Appeal.

posts.post_content:
Cobby still available at a reasonable price. I'd be happy to email a larger, more detailed scan for anyone interested to see how nice this card looks and how virtually difficult it is to see the two creases which account for the technically low grade. 

-Christopher.
Fantastic card, Christopher. Good luck with your sale.

Reminds me of my old Cobb
